bug.short_desc: [1.8][dom]Incorrect source ranges for annotated SimpleType that is nested in a ParameterizedType

long_desc.thetext: Looks like the problem is for the ParameterizedType's SimpleType, which is "@Marker W" and NOT "@Marker W<String>" as I had mentioned earlier.

(In reply to Jayaprakash Arthanareeswaran from comment #1) > Looks like the problem is for the ParameterizedType's SimpleType, which is > "@Marker W" and NOT "@Marker W<String>" as I had mentioned earlier.
> Use the ASTView on the following code and get an error dialog about 'Bad AST > Node structure. > > > The problem appears that in this particular case the AnnotatableType > (@Marker W<String>) doesn't include the annotation in it's source range.
Jay: This issue will be resolved when bug 413569 is solved. You can use the WIP patch at: https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/attachment.cgi?id=235631 as well and get an early look at the solution.

(In reply to Manoj Palat from comment #2)
> Jay: This issue will be resolved when bug 413569 is solved. You can use the > WIP patch at: https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/attachment.cgi?id=235631 as well > and get an early look at the solution.

The issue is fixed as already reported by bug 413569. I wasn't sure if any of the current tests in ASTConvert18Test cover this scenario. In any case, I have added a new test in ASTConverter18Test.testBug417669().
